title: Train Miner
description_short: Fast-paced space shooter with multiple levels and power-ups
description: Space Blaster is an exciting space shooter where you pilot a spacecraft through dangerous asteroid fields while battling alien enemies.
description_full: Space Blaster is an exciting space shooter where you pilot a spacecraft through dangerous asteroid fields while battling alien enemies. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and defeat challenging boss enemies. With stunning graphics and responsive controls, Space Blaster offers hours of thrilling gameplay across 10 unique levels. Can you save the galaxy from the alien invasion?
controls: Use arrow keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press SPACE to shoot. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and defeat the alien invaders.
